item.title: Authenticating using Facebook
item.description: I had figured out how to authenticate users using Facebook a couple of months back. But I didn’t document it, and so yesterday I again wasted my time figuring it out. So here is the brain dumb so that I won’t waste my time again at the time of need. :) Prerequisite: Create an appusing Facebook Developer account and create the necessary App ID and App Secret keys. If you are testing out your app and you are running it locally, the site URL should be something likeÂ http://localhost:8090/
